intro: Diabelia spathulata, commonly known as the broad-leaved diabelia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa and the Arabian Peninsula. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many milkweed-related species. The plant is characterized by its broad, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color.
